definition: The term refers to an unexpected event or circumstance that occurs without prior anticipation or prediction. It is commonly used to describe situations or occurrences that are unforeseen or unanticipated.

examples.german: Die unvorhergesehene Verzögerung hat uns Zeit gekostet.
examples.english: The unforeseen delay has cost us time.

examples.german: Die unvorhergesehene Änderung des Plans hat zu Problemen geführt.
examples.english: The unforeseen change in the plan has caused problems.

examples.german: Die unvorhergesehene Reaktion des Publikums hat uns überrascht.
examples.english: The unforeseen reaction of the audience has surprised us.

examples.german: Die unvorhergesehene Wetterlage hat unsere Pläne durcheinander gebracht.
examples.english: The unforeseen weather conditions have disrupted our plans.
